description: Gets information about an access control configuration that you created for your documents in an index. This includes user and group access information for your documents. This is useful for user context filtering, where search results are filtered based on the user or their group access to documents.

parameters.name: IndexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index for an access control configuration.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The identifier of the access control configuration you want to get information on.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name for the access control configuration.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description for the access control configuration.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message containing details if there are issues processing the access control configuration.

nested_items.name: AccessControlList
nested_items.description: Information on principals (users and/or groups) and which documents they should have access to. This is useful for user context filtering, where search results are filtered based on the user or their group access to documents.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the user or group.

nested_items.name: Access
nested_items.description: Whether to allow or deny document access to the principal.

nested_items.name: DataSourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the data source the principal should access documents from.

nested_items.name: HierarchicalAccessControlList
nested_items.description: The list of principal lists that define the hierarchy for which documents users should have access to.

nested_items.name: PrincipalList
nested_items.description: A list of principal lists that define the hierarchy for which documents users should have access to. Each hierarchical list specifies which user or group has allow or deny access for each document.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the user or group.

nested_items.name: Access
nested_items.description: Whether to allow or deny document access to the principal.

nested_items.name: DataSourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the data source the principal should access documents from.
